attributes.action: allow Calvin Broadus aka Snoop Dogg into the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe Snoop Dogg should be granted a temporary visa to visit the United Kingdom to perform his planned series on concerts. Thousands of fans of hip-hop music have already paid upwards of £30 per ticket to see this living legend and the government have seen fit to deny him access to the country for no good reason. Although i am in favour of us being more scrupulous of who we allow to enter our great country i truly believe this man poses no threat to our safety. He is here to entertain through music and culture that is all.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
